options.explain:
Attacks randomly drop a thunderbolt within 300 px around you, creating the following effects.
- Shocks enemies for 15 sec.
- Shocks you for 15 sec.
options.explainDetail:
Attacks randomly drop a thunderbolt within 300 px around you, creating the following effects. (Cooldown: 10 sec. Inflicts 21% of total Damage Value, regardless of enemy Def.)
- Shocks enemies for 15 sec.
- Shocks you for 15 sec. (This Shock effect can't be removed by skills or Consumables, and ignores your Shock Tolerance.)

When you're affected by 2 or more Abnormal statuses among Bleeding, Poison, Shock, and Burn, causes 1 effect that's not on you to enemies for 7 sec. every 7 sec.

options.explainDetail:
When you're affected by 2 or more Abnormal statuses among Bleeding, Poison, Shock, and Burn, causes 1 effect that's not on you to enemies for 7 sec. every 7 sec. (These Bleeding, Poison, Shock, and Burn effects can't be removed by skills or Consumables, and ignore your Bleeding, Poison, Shock, and Burn Tolerances.)
